user_query: I'm planning a trip to Europe and I need to convert 1000 USD to EUR. Can you please provide me with the current exchange rate using CurrencyAPI.net? Additionally, I would like to know the historical price data for Bitcoin and Ethereum on Coinranking for the past month.

TaskList.description: Fetch the current exchange rate for USD to EUR using CurrencyAPI.net.
Convert 1000 USD to EUR using the exchange rate obtained from the previous step.
Retrieve the historical price data for Bitcoin on Coinranking for the last month.
Retrieve the historical price data for Ethereum on Coinranking for the last month.
